string * maskAttributes

Detailed Description

This class describes the geometry parameters of the HRRT scanner
Parameters:
dtctPerBlock detector number per block in x or y direction
blockPerBankX block number per bank in x direction
blockPerBankZ block number per bank in Z direction
nLayer number of layers
nBank number of banks
nBlock number of blocks
panelSeparation value of ring diameters in mm
dtctPitch value of detector pitch in mm
dtctDepth1 detector depth in layer 1, mm
dtctDepth2 detector depth in layer 2, mm
coincidence number of bank coincidence
nDtct number of detetors in X direction
nRing number of detectors in Z direction or in a ring
liveTimeParam0 constant term for getLiveTime
liveTimeParam1 linear term for getLivetTime
liveTimeParam2 quadratic term for getLiveTime
numLOR total possible LORs
dtctType1 type of scintillator in 1st layer
dtctType2 type of scintillator in 2nd layer
dtctWidthX crystal width, azimuthally
dtctWidthZ crystal width, axially
bankLength axial length of scanner field-of-view
cylinderDiameter trans-axial diameter of Field-of-View
bankWidth azimuthal width of detector panel
int timeStampsPerSecond time stamps per second

Definition at line 37 of file HRRTScannerParams.hpp.
